website_summaries.verdict: This model combines the waterproof features of other Braven models with a longer battery life and sound-balancing technology for optimized bass sound.
pros: The sound-balancing technology of this model offers clear sound without distortion, and without burying the bass
The 4,400 mAh battery can last an impressive 18 hours on a full charge, making extended outdoor use a possibility
When being used outdoors, the Balance also protects against inclement weather conditions with the protective waterproof exterior available on other Braven models
A USB power bank is also included
cons: While the sound-balancing technology offers very clear sound, this model is not quite as loud as some others when used outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Have searched for a good portable blue tooth speaker for a while
customer_reviews.text: Have searched for a good portable blue tooth speaker for a while. It is well made, sturdy, and waterproof. Has paired well with my devices. Sounds fantastic and can easily fill a 20x20 room with great sound. The 18 hour battery is amazing. I am more impressed with this than the bose soundlink color. I got a really great price buying it "used like new" from the Amazon marketplace. I am really impressed and glad I chose this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mossleif

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker, No way to charge in the car
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of bang for your buck with this speaker. I bought it after being impressed with the sound quality of a friend’s. My problem is that you can only charge it on the wall! My car doesn’t have blue tooth, so my favorite place to use it is in the car. With all the accessories, I’m surprised and disappointed that you can’t charge it on the fly!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Cappelli

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, long life
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up as a present for my wife. And when I step into her office I often find her using this with her phone instead of using her computer and its speakers. She also takes it into work on office days. She enjoys the sound quality and gets plenty of battery life from it. It isn't as small about portable and other units in the house, not as powerful and loud as others... but provides a good balance between size and power. And because of that little extra size, there is better bass than others speakers in th house.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This one is by far the best. Its the loudest and its water proof
customer_reviews.text: We own every Braven speaker there is out there. This one is by far the best. Its the loudest and its water proof. We use this around the pool area every day
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought one a couple of years ago and we always fought over who would use it. I finally decided to get one of my own. I love this portable speaker system. I use it while house cleaning, outside working and have taken it out on the lake. Well worth the money. You won't be disappointed!! The colors are fun too!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my bf and he raves about the quality of the sound and battery life. I personally have two other braven speakers...not this model but I do love them. Price was right and the color's are fantastic! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elva

customer_reviews.title: The best !!!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth it big time love the color also it sounds great i saw this speaker at walmart but they are asking 130$$ for itso i looked it up on Amazon payed 48 $$ Beat you walmart. This speaker is waterproof and the sound is sweet love watching movies or listen to music. 5 star allday got my 03-10-018
customer_reviews.author: Slougans B

customer_reviews.title: Loud and crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker specifically because an ex-girlfriend had one and I loved the sound, base, size and water resistant feature so much that it was a no-brainer I was going to get it for myself. The sound will blast throughout a large kitchen/living room and backyard for those weekend cookouts. And great for poolside, too, of course (another reason why I got this one).
customer_reviews.author: Octavio

customer_reviews.title: I really like this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker! Plays plenty loud, looks great, and has plenty of power to charge/run my phone for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pinball

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. My boyfriend already had it in a different color so I already new it was great. The charge lasts long for our boat days and best of all you can charge your cell phone on it without completely draining the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small size
customer_reviews.text: This is my second braven balance I've purchased, I love the portability and the sound quality plus I can go three days at work before charging it back up. A big plus is the extreme water resistance, I've been caught in the pouring rain and this speaker keeps playing and never misses a beat. The first braven balance I bought is two to three years old and still performs well and lasts 3 workdays on a charge, but the price was well worth getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: john parsons

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the sound quality and ease of use for the price point. I ordered this model after reading many, many reviews and round-ups of Bluetooth speakers under $100 (and even considering some up to $199). I use this for streaming audio from my phone, and also as an external speaker for my smart tv (via audio cable).
customer_reviews.author: C. DiStasio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality music but it only works 30% of  the time
customer_reviews.text: Does not "pair " to I phone all the time. I wouldn't buy it agian
customer_reviews.author: Mel Ronick

customer_reviews.title: Greatest speaker I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: Best speakers for traveling, especially because it also charges your phone and it’s waterproof! It’s also great for the pool of to listen to in the shower. Sound quality and volume is great.
customer_reviews.author: Danton SM

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker around!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker! The sound quality is ridiculous on this little thing and we have put it under water several times and never had a problem. We tell all our friends and family about this speaker, so BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Green

customer_reviews.title: Best in its category
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful speaker,built to last,long playtime battery,form factor amazing,submersible,loud and clear for its size,love it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rogofsky

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and Long Lived
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Took it camping and had it on full volume almost all day for two days straight. It outlasted the phone and I had to plug the phone into the speaker to charge. Sound quality is good as is the volume. Also made it thru a few hours of rain with no issues (I didn't let it get soaked but it did get wet). The bright neon orange also helped find it when set down in the woods. Very pleased and will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Seriously the best speaker. Do NOT get it in seawater though
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best speaker. Do NOT get it in seawater though! Should be a given, but I did that and it ended up broken. Bought another one and it's fantastic. Has been dropped in lakes, rivers, splashed in the pool and is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Jetpack

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shower speaker, with loads of bass!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value at around $60. I bought to use in the bathroom and shower, and I couldn't be happier. Gets incredibly loud with very little distortion. Amazing bass response and battery life for its size. Makes getting ready in the morning a whole lot more fun.
customer_reviews.author: nrfx01

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: My husband tested out many of these portable Bluetooth waterproof speakers and sound wise this one really is the best for the money! We've used it all summer at the beach and it has a very long battery life and you can also charge your phone on it! If ordering on prime compare prices on the colors! We wound up getting lime green for a lot less than some of the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Liebman

customer_reviews.title: She is really happy with it it sounds great and the battery last ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. She is really happy with it it sounds great and the battery last for day's. I have had the same one for three years so I know it will last her for years.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely built, good sound and built rugged !!
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, not big bass but for what I need it for its going to be great. Love the rugged build.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the feel and the sound of the flip better
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel and the sound of the flip better. But the speaker for my flip blew after 1 year. I am happy with this one for the price. We will see how long it lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakee

customer_reviews.text: there is nothing I dislike about this speaker. This is the third one I have bought because people in my house keep stealing them from the rooms I have them in. Bought a pink one now they dont touch it anymore.I absolutely love this speaker.

customer_reviews.title: Big full sound from a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really do believe you are getting what you pay for from this speaker. Even when working in the backyard this speaker is strong enough the produce a nice sound. Boost mode provides an even louder sound. The battery life is excellent and it's super easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update: have now had this for years and our entire family has one. Best speaker i have ever found. No issues at all. Only wish i could connect multiple speakers. Stills plays as good as the day I bought it!!! I have had this for a week and had four people also place orders after seeing this product. Looks great, sounds great and love the features. I can charge my phone without significant drain of battery to the speaker. I can change songs from the speaker and love the longevity of play time. I am a big fan!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best $$ spent in a long time! Amazing sound perfect for by the water. Mine took a swim in the river and didn't skip a beat!

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing amongst family of 7
customer_reviews.text: In a family of 7 the Braven Balace works wonders. It is very durable, long lasting and loud. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easily pairs with devices. The combo button controls can take to try or two to get right, there is only a power, pause/play, and volume +/- button. The Braven balance feature throws out fairly loud and undistorted sound. We recently used unit outside and found our music audible from 30+ feet away. The rubbery exterior is both durable and appears to be truly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not super loud but sounds clear, bass is deep, haven’t dropped it yet or got it wet, but it’s heavy duty looks clean.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Way better than the over priced Beats products.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME speaker, for indoor or outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: LOUD! Sound really carries outdoors. Great bass response - those little woofers on the ends really work. Sturdy. Feels well-built in hand, and has already weathered a few falls with no signs of damage. Versatile. Can be set up on it's back, or standing up. Rubberized grip keeps it in place in both positions, no matter how much the bass is kicking! Convenient. The charging port in the back is low current, but the internal batteries have the capacity to fully charge most phones. Cons: Size. It's probably bigger than you think. It's about as wide as TWO Bose SoundLink speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Che Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my expectations great value for the price proof you don't have to pay top dollar for quality

customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Speaker has a great sound.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple to use speaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple to use speaker. Use it in the kitchen to listen to music from my iPhone while I'm cooking. Decent clarity and volume.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! I bought it to use for my camper. It has amazing sound!!!!

customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. Has very good sound. Best speaker for the price I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Renee C

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, good battery life. I received the wrong color - wasn't a big deal since I picked the cheapest color. I was supposed to receive the white and gray model, but received a very bright blue model. I probably could have returned the unit, but the color really wasn't that important to me. My biggest gripe with this model is the buttons can be difficult to push and don't provide much feedback. It's also difficult to tell whether the speaker is turned on or not.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is just awesome! I love love love it! Easy to take along and incredible sound for the money! Simple pairing process and battery life is great! I was looking for a battery charger for my iPhone and got me the Braven Balance instead which includes the external battery! Paid $59.- because of the color.. hey I couldn’t care less.. I love the lime green, no need to pay $70.- more to get a black one ;-)! You won’t get anywhere else more for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was just as new, as described. Works perfectly. Time of delivery was short.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Speaker works great. Volume is fabulous. Used it on a float trip and we blew the other rafters out of the water. Bluetooth connection was great. Battery life was long lasting. We played it for 10 hours straight with no problems. I didn't take it under the water, but our raft was sprayed down, and I didn't have to worry about about it at all. It was like it never got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent clarity and bass
customer_reviews.text: The demo track at Target sold me on this speaker. Excellent clarity and bass. Seemed to me at least as good as the $300 Bose unit down the aisle. This particular bright yellowish green color was available on Amazon for $83 and some change versus $129.99 retail prize at Target (and Amazon for other colors). I like the color, however, and think the purchase was good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: R. McNally

customer_reviews.title: Poolside or Outdoors its perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Braven portable speaker, it by far blows away the competition of similar priced items. It is easy to set up, can remember up to 8 Bluetooth devices and will charge your phone as well. The vibrant orange will not get lost in the background on a camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: Squish and Bug Green

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice speaker, very easy to use and good sound ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice speaker, very easy to use and good sound quality. Exactly as I expected from reading the description. Arrived quickly and on time.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great design , sound needs better bass
customer_reviews.text: I like the design , the color , it feels really well fabricated , good quality of components , I say premium, nice to touch,, the sound I think is not too good as it is the design, it just needs a better bass
customer_reviews.author: Alan Axell

customer_reviews.title: Flat sound.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible flat sound. Returned it a few days after receiving it. Not even worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Solid device!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is a handy device to take to my apt gym so I can Rock Out with my Workout or take it to my Make arm for some ambiance!! Handy and easy to use.. Love that it's waterproof! I also use it as an aesthetician in my treatment room for spa music. I like it because I can still send and receive txt and phone calls!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I use it by my pool all the time, since its water resistant, it has a good strong sound. Never had any problems with pairing it to my iphone. Keeps a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Marozas

customer_reviews.title: Sounds "OK"... speakers broke with 6 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds "OK"...speakers broke with 6 months use. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Loud and powerful, but needs more bass.
customer_reviews.text: Loud, durable, and with long lasting battery power. My only issue is the lack of deeper bass. If there was a way to increase the bass, then this would definitely get a 5.
customer_reviews.author: HyojinLight

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker sound, versatile and easy bluetooth connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable portable speaker, with nice deep sounds! It seems like we've used it for months and still have half the battery life left! The sound is great and comes at you from all directions, and the bluetooth connecting is really smooth and quick. We needed something versatile to go rving and for our backyard. Can't think of a better or greater looking speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Plaker

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than expected however its great! Sound is superb
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than expected however its great! Sound is superb, connectivity is super easy and charging an external component off of it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite a nice looking (and feeling) speaker
customer_reviews.text: Quite a nice looking (and feeling) speaker. Was very easy to pair. Just didn’t sound as good as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jochetz

customer_reviews.title: The Box doesnt have the Charger
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I got the Box with the Speaker but inside the box isnt the Charger. What i have to do i this case? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my BRAVEN Balance speaker. I got it on sale for 89 dollars. It's beautiful and sleek right out of the package. The instructions are easy to follow and pretty straight forward. The sound quality is also pretty amazing. I use one for my large living room and kitchen area and it does just fine. It's not quite as good as a Sonos, but it's less than half the price which was well worth it for me!! I cannot recommend this speaker enough.
customer_reviews.author: J and H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for float trips or anything outdoor!
customer_reviews.text: Got this guy before a float trip and all I can say is WOW! Super loud and super waterproof. Cant beat this for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Bank Of America

customer_reviews.title: No Bass + Skin-Crawling Equalizer. Seller won't refund.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful speaker. No (and I mean NO) bass, and the music equalizer makes your skin crawl and you can't wait to turn it off (I opened it up and could only stand it for about 3 minutes). I suppose the charging feature would be nice, but maybe just get a cheap power cell instead? I tried to contact the seller for a return and they wouldn't reply. Now I'm stuck with a $60 speaker that will end up in the trash. Note to seller: If you reply to my return request, I'll delete this review.
customer_reviews.author: jmus

customer_reviews.title: Maybe ok
customer_reviews.text: It is probably a nice speaker, but I received an open box product with a used or returned dirty speaker. It was meant as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Thought I would really like this as I had other bravens I really liked
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would really like this as I had other bravens I really liked. Sounded so muted I had no option but to return
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not.hifi, but OK.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly decent sound, the louder it is the better it sounds. Not HiFi. For the price its OK.
customer_reviews.author: mark

product_meta.title: BRAVEN Balance Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker [18 Hour Playtime][Waterproof] Built-in 4000 mAh Power Bank - Retail Packaging - Electric Lime
product_meta.description: Color:Lime/Gray/GrayThe powerful Braven Balance speaker is designed with the active individual in mind. Available in sporty color options, the Braven Balance delivers room-filling sound to enhance your active, on-the-go lifestyle.
feature_bullets: Charge your mobile device using the speaker's built-in 4400mAh Lithium-ion battery.
Built-in noise-canceling microphone for hands-free calls.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars292 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
